医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
检测技术在 RSNA 2024 上推出先进的 X 射线探测器产品组合全球领先的 X 射线探测器解决方案检测技术公司在 RSNA 2024 展会上推出了全面的平板 X 射线探测器产品组合，以推进医学成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Detection-Technology-launches-advanced-X-ray- detector-portfolio-at-RSNA-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Detection-Technology-launches-advanced-X-ray- detector-portfolio-at-RSNA-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f014e7f-2c94-446c-9a25-3861cac1a34b Mon, 25 Nov 2024 00:05:00 -0500 Detection Technology launches advanced X-ray detector portfolio at RSNA 2024
Mursla Bio 宣布 EvoLiver 检测在肝癌检测中取得了可喜的结果Mursla Bio 是细胞外囊泡 (EV) 科学领域的领导者，其使命是通过动态活检技术的力量显着改善高危患者的癌症结果，今天宣布了其多中心临床研究 MEV01 的结果，该研究与领先的学术机构包括伦敦大学学院、伦敦帝国学院、圣玛丽亚大学医院和格拉茨医科大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Mursla-Bio-announces-promising-results-for-EvoLiver-test-in-liver-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Mursla-Bio-announces-promising-results-for-EvoLiver-test-in-liver-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71e93153-496c-46f9-843a-5cf355be9c13 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 00:04:00 -0500 Mursla Bio announces promising results for EvoLiver test in liver cancer detection
Freya Biosciences 获得新投资，开发细菌性阴道病的微生物免疫疗法Freya Biosciences（Freya 或公司）是一家专注于女性健康的跨大西洋生物技术公司，今天宣布获得比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会（基金会）1040 万美元的战略投资，目前投资者丹麦出口和投资基金提供 140 万美元的额外融资（EIFO）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Freya-Biosciences-secures-new-investment-to-develop-microbial-immunotherapies-for-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Freya-Biosciences-secures-new-investment-to-develop-microbial-immunotherapies-for-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05c8965b-546b-47a8-a3a0-7c31a7d2bf72 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 00:02:00 -0500 Freya Biosciences secures new investment to develop microbial immunotherapies for bacterial vaginosis
研究显示高收入国家和低收入国家之间的癌症治疗不平等现象日益加剧最近的一项分析显示，全球不同地区抗癌药物的成本和可用性存在显着差异，高收入国家和低收入国家之间存在巨大差距。该研究结果由 Wiley 在线发表在美国癌症协会同行评审期刊《CANCER》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-shows-having-cancer-treatment-inequities- Between-high-and-low-venue-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-shows-having-cancer-treatment-inequities- Between-high-and-low-venue-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e10e388-13fd-4e88-b655-e1ea8e9b5446 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 00:00:00 -0500 Study shows growing cancer treatment inequities between high and low-income countries
专家确定了对抗幼儿蛀牙的关键策略曼彻斯特大学的研究人员为卫生领导者找到了几种解决英国儿童蛀牙问题的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Experts-identify-key-strategies-to-combat-tooth-decay-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Experts-identify-key-strategies-to-combat-tooth-decay-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=389a2069-742e-4d54-b000-c2adca37263b Sun, 24 Nov 2024 23:59:00 -0500 Experts identify key strategies to combat tooth decay in young children
探索个性化精准医疗在医疗保健行业的潜力我们都有独特的面孔、指纹、声音和签名，那么为什么我们对所接受的药物和治疗没有独特的反应呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Exploring-the-pottial-of-personalized- precision-medicine-for-healthcare-industry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Exploring-the-pottial-of-personalized- precision-medicine-for-healthcare-industry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d15d9891-b056-4539-bb86-f2f7468c73e7 Sun, 24 Nov 2024 23:57:00 -0500 Exploring the potential of personalized precision medicine for healthcare industry
尿戊糖素揭示年轻男性的肌肉和表现健康状况这项研究探讨了尿戊糖素作为年轻男性肌肉力量和身体表现的潜在生物标志物，揭示了与关键肌肉骨骼参数的显着负相关。研究结果表明它在评估糖化应激和指导健康干预方面具有潜在作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Urinary-pentosidine-reveals-muscle-and-performance-health-in-young-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Urinary-pentosidine-reveals-muscle-and-performance-health-in-young-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f28f986-f06f-4d5e-9356-08c40d0770cb Sun, 24 Nov 2024 22:10:00 -0500 Urinary pentosidine reveals muscle and performance health in young men
随着一次性电子烟的流行，戒烟者的电子烟使用量急剧增加在年轻化人口和一次性电子烟的推动下，英格兰戒烟者中使用电子烟的比例从 2013 年的 2% 飙升至 2024 年的 20% 以上，引发了对健康影响和吸烟复吸的质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Vaping-among-ex-smokers-grows-sharply-as-disposable-e-香烟-take-hold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Vaping-among-ex-smokers-grows-sharply-as-disposable-e-香烟-take-hold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bffbbc9d-b033-454c-84ea-c40b43594ebb Sun, 24 Nov 2024 21:40:00 -0500 Vaping among ex-smokers grows sharply as disposable e-cigarettes take hold
英国色盲学生的无声抗争一位作者警告说，大约 45 万名儿童在英国教育系统中表现不佳，因为他们有特殊的教育需求和残疾 (SEND)，而大多数学校和当地教育当局实际上并未认识到他们的特殊教育需求和残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/The-silent-struggles-of-color-blind-students-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/The-silent-struggles-of-color-blind-students-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64782f02-ee89-46b5-a4d6-730279b58878 Sun, 24 Nov 2024 21:29:28 -0500 The silent struggles of color blind students in the UK
从子宫到中年：产前免疫紊乱重塑记忆和认知衰老产前接触母体促炎细胞因子会影响后代的记忆和免疫功能，并在 50 多年来出现性别特异性效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/From-womb-to-midlife-Prenatal-immune-disruptions-reshape-memory-and-cognitive-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/From-womb-to-midlife-Prenatal-immune-disruptions-reshape-memory-and-cognitive-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40c10f9b-d892-4e72-b4df-3e4feb8f23e2 Sun, 24 Nov 2024 21:21:00 -0500 From womb to midlife: Prenatal immune disruptions reshape memory and cognitive aging
